comments:
BUILD: emft-compare-SDK-I200706191242

I should get a error message, that the file in not correct.
Bernd

Now we've got an encapsulating Exception providing the original error, for instance :

Package with uri 'http://www.eclipse.org/emddf/2002/Ecore' not found

In Eclipse 3.2 the error is displayed in the editor and in the error log, in Eclipse 3.3 it's only displayed in the error log but it seems it's now the default compare behavior.

Don't you want to open a dialog and inform the user? I think this would be better than just displaying the runtime exception.

Bernd
Here it's a more general choice of the Eclipse compare framework, I'll check with them.
